channel.title: TrimmedScape - by Archer
channel.description:
TrimmedScape By Archer.
Base: Final Devo 2.7
Fetures: 1. Everything in trimmed scape now. 2. Fully working friends/ignore list and private messaging 3. Fully working Fletching 4. Fully working Combat straight from devo 2.7 5. All portals, in there right places. 6. Economic Base 7. Fully working WorldObject (global object) handler 8. Everything in devo 2.7 9. Drop resetting fixed. 10. Password Pin system (secure player passwords)
(ugly client i know) Pics:
Log in: (has char screen on first log in) [IMG]http://i215.photobucket.com/albums/cc292/Kite2/tslog.jpg[/img]
Some portals: [IMG]http://i215.photobucket.com/albums/cc292/Kite2/tsport.jpg[/img]
Npcs: [IMG]http://i215.photobucket.com/albums/cc292/Kite2/sometsnpcs.jpg[/img]
Drops: [IMG]http://i215.photobucket.com/albums/cc292/Kite2/tsdrops.jpg[/img]
DL Link: http://uppit.com/v/RRQ49Y1L
Credits: Me. for leaking Archer for being truly stupid O_O
